text: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
author: Helen Keller

text: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
author: John F. Kennedy

text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: Les Brown

text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

text: You will never win if you never begin.
author: Helen Rowland

text: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.
author: Brian Tracy
